etymons.meaning: Reihe; < Kurd. rêz cf. Ku 641: ‘строй, ряд, шеренга’; cf. Barwar ryz (III), Khan 2008 1171: to stand in a row; to put in a row; Sardarid maryiz, Younasardaroud 108: ordnen

Preterit.turoyo: fayəš ko-royəz abšoṯe m-i=dukṯo d-rəzle l-awo u=ḥreno
translations: He began strewing raisins from that place where the other had strewn

tokens.value: fayəš ko-royəz abšoṯe m-i=dukṯo d-rəzle l-awo u=ḥreno
ʻHe began strewing raisins from that place where the other had strewnʼ

Preterit.text: fayəš ko-royəz abšoṯe m-i=dukṯo d-rəzle l-awo u=ḥreno ʻHe began strewing raisins from that place where the other had strewnʼ; 518; 44/40;

Infectum.turoyo: gər-royazno me-larwal m-i=qriṯo ṭlawḥe hul l-i=arʕo
translations: I will be strewing lentils from the outside of the village till the field

tokens.value: gər-royazno me-larwal m-i=qriṯo ṭlawḥe hul l-i=arʕo
ʻI will be strewing lentils from the outside of the village till the fieldʼ

Infectum.text: gər-royazno me-larwal m-i=qriṯo ṭlawḥe hul l-i=arʕo ʻI will be strewing lentils from the outside of the village till the fieldʼ; 522; 44/70;

Infectum.turoyo: awwə́l d-nəfqat m-i=qriṯo g-royazno abšoṯe b-u=darbo. w-talax b-u=šop-awo hul d-moṭat l-gabi!
translations: ‘As soon as you go out from the village I will strew raisins along the way. Follow this track unless you reach me!’

tokens.value: g-royazno abšoṯe b-u=darbo. w-talax b-u=šop-awo hul d-moṭat l-gabi!
‘As soon as you go out from the village I will strew raisins along the way. Follow this track unless you reach me!’

Infectum.text: awwə́l d-nəfqat m-i=qriṯo, g-royazno abšoṯe b-u=darbo. w-talax b-u=šop-awo hul d-moṭat l-gabi! ‘As soon as you go out from the village I will strew raisins along the way. Follow this track unless you reach me!’; 44/38 [MT];

Infectum.turoyo: yəmkən hani nfolo nafili me-noše. huwe lo=ko-royəz hawxa əšmo. ašər g-əzzí bəṯr-ani aġ=ġalabe!
translations: ‘Perhaps, these [raisins] dropped out from somebody’s [pocket]. He does not strew so a few [raisins]. I will sure follow [the way where there are] many [raisins]’

tokens.value: yəmkən hani nfolo nafili me-noše. huwe lo=ko-royəz hawxa əšmo. ašər g-əzzí bəṯr-ani aġ=ġalabe!
‘Perhaps, these [raisins] dropped out from somebody’s [pocket]. He does not strew so a few [raisins]. I will sure follow [the way where there are] many [raisins]’

Infectum.text: yəmkən hani nfolo nafili me-noše. huwe lo=ko-royəz hawxa əšmo. ašər g-əzzí bəṯr-ani aġ=ġalabe! ‘Perhaps, these [raisins] dropped out from somebody’s [pocket]. He does not strew so a few [raisins]. I will sure follow [the way where there are] many [raisins]’; 44/47

Infectum-wa.turoyo: hawo royaz-wo ḥabṯo ḥabṯo hano u=kačălōk rəzle ġắlabe
translations: That was strewing [raisins] grain by grain, this bald-headed [on the other hand] strewed [raisins] in handfuls

tokens.value: ʻThat was strewing [raisins] grain by grain, this bald-headed [on the other hand] strewed [raisins] in handfulsʼ

Infectum-wa.text: hawo royaz-wo ḥabṯo ḥabṯo, hano u=kačălōk rəzle ġắlabe ʻThat was strewing [raisins] grain by grain, this bald-headed [on the other hand] strewed [raisins] in handfulsʼ; 524; 44/41;

Part. Pass..turoyo: aʕ=ʕarše rize ʕal al=luġme ʕloye w taḥtóye-ne
translations: die Zähne sind aufgereiht auf der oberen und der unteren Kinnlade

tokens.value: aʕ=ʕarše rize ʕal al=luġme ʕloye w taḥtóye-ne
'die Zähne sind aufgereiht auf der oberen und der unteren Kinnlade'

Part. Pass..turoyo: ga kal kīt abšoṯe rize b-u=darbo
translations: ‘There are raisins scattered along the way’
